@@ -39,0 +39,9 @@ +/** + * This class implements the SunJSSE X.509 trust manager using the internal + * validator API in J2SE core. The logic in this class is minimal. + *

+ * This class supports both the Simple validation algorithm from previous + * JSSE versions and PKIX validation. + * + * @author Andreas Sterbenz + */
